process-services.title: Pricing and Initial Consultation
process-services.description: We begin with an initial consultation to understand your project requirements, goals, and budget. We provide a detailed proposal outlining the scope of work, pricing, and timetable.

process-services.title: Design for Shopify Store
process-services.description: Our team is dedicated to creating attractive, user-friendly designs that increase conversion. Discover how we create UI, UX and web designs here.

process-services.title: Theme Development
process-services.description:
Our team starts creating your custom Shopify store.
We focus on crafting a compatible design and highly functional eCommerce platform that aligns with your brand and business goals.

process-services.title: Store development
process-services.description:
Our testers conduct rigorous testing to ensure your Shopify store functions flawlessly.
We perform functionality tests, usability tests, and security checks. We base our actions on Quality Assurance.

process-services.title: Client Review and Possible Amendments
process-services.description:
We present the Shopify store for your review and feedback.
You have the opportunity to change requests about design and functionality modifications. Every task comes to final testing.

process-services.title: Deployment
process-services.description: After your review and optional amendments, we ensure a flawless deployment, transitioning your Shopify store from its developmental stage to full production.

process-services.title: Your Project Acceptance
process-services.description: After we provide the last updates, you have 30 days to report your comments. You can accept the project once you are satisfied with the final deliverable.

process-services.title: Project development and maintenance
process-services.description: We offer project maintenance and development after your Shopify storeâ€™s successful launch. You can request new features, updates, or modifications to your Shopify store in response to changing business needs.
